* [[Unions of Elves and Men|Second Union of Elves and Men]] occurs in [[Gondolin]], where [[Tuor]] weds [[Idril]].<ref name="Years">{{WJ|Years}}, pp. 350-1</ref><ref>{{S|Gondolin}}</ref>
* [[Húrin]] comes to [[Nargothrond]] and slays [[Mîm]] the [[Petty-dwarves|petty-dwarf]] in revenge for [[Túrin|his son's]] death. He then seizes the treasure of [[Glaurung]] and takes the [[Nauglamír]].<ref name="Doriath">{{S|Doriath}}</ref><ref name="Hurin">{{WJ|Hurin}}, p. 258</ref>
* Arriving to [[Menegroth]], Húrin casts the Nauglamír at [[Thingol|Thingol's]] feet. Realising from [[Melian]] that he has been acting evilly due to [[Morgoth|Morgoth's]] curse, Húrin leaves [[Doriath]] and throws himself into the [[Belegaer|Sea]].<ref name="Doriath"/><ref name="Hurin"/><ref>{{SM|Q14}}, p. 96</ref>
* Thingol commissions the [[Dwarves of Nogrod|Dwarves]] of [[Nogrod]] to embed the [[Silmaril]] into the Nauglamír.<ref name="Years"/><ref name="Doriath"/>
